details.title: Identification of transient and permanent faults
details.abstract: A new algorithm was developed for arcing fault detection based on high-frequency current transients analyzed with wavelet transforms to avoid automatic reclosing on permanent faults. The characteristics of arc currents during transient faults were investigated. The current curves of transient and permanent faults are quite similar since current variation from the fault arc is much less than the voltage variation. However, the fault current details are quite different because of the arc extinguishing and reigniting. Dyadic wavelet transforms were used to identify the cur rent var iation since wavelet transform has time-frequerey localization ability. Many electric magnetic transent program (EMTP) simulations have verified the feasibility of the algorithm.
